Articles.Content: Would there be any use for a physicsless, massless, colliderless, invisible part, that does nothing else but attach to a node in the VAB/SPH and closes the attach node for good?

I think there's a couple of mods, rocket parts with complicated assembly, that already supply such a part, so it must be useful for certain things.  I doubt it's enough in itself to make a mod from though, as it could be achieved using an existing part and a MM cfg for a cfg and texture change

When the stock texture switcher is implemented, this problem may be solved.  It depends on it's implementation abilities though.
